experiment_info.name: full_sim_reranking
experiment_info.description: Re-evaluate top-5 candidates with full simulation to select true best for polish
experiment_info.hypothesis: 40% temporal fidelity ranking may select wrong candidate

reason_aborted: ALREADY IMPLEMENTED IN BASELINE. The optimizer_with_polish.py already evaluates ALL candidates with FULL timesteps (lines 345-364) BEFORE selecting the best for polish (line 369). This experiment proposes functionality that already exists.

early_timestep_filtering.workflow: 1. CMA-ES with 40% timesteps, 2. Evaluate top candidates on FULL timesteps, 3. NM polish on BEST candidate with full timesteps

ranking_correlation.result: 40% timesteps gives 0.95+ Spearman correlation with full RMSE
ranking_correlation.implication: Even if not re-ranked, ranking would be correct 95%+ of time

key_insight: The proposed experiment is a DUPLICATE of existing baseline functionality. The baseline already: (1) evaluates all candidates with full timesteps, (2) selects best based on full-timestep RMSE, (3) polishes the true best. No additional re-ranking is needed.
